hero.title: About Shiv Brass
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Precision Manufacturing Since 1993
hero.description: Shiv Brass has been a pioneering force in precision component manufacturing for three decades, delivering high-quality brass components to automotive and aerospace industries. Our commitment to innovation and quality has made us a trusted partner for complex manufacturing solutions.

meta.title: Shiv Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: Leading precision brass component manufacturer with 30 years of expertise, serving automotive and aerospace industries with advanced manufacturing solutions.

items.content: Shiv Brass is a leading precision brass component manufacturer with 30 years of expertise, specializing in automotive and aerospace sectors. We deliver custom and mass-production solutions using advanced manufacturing technologies and maintaining the highest quality standards.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Comprehensive design and engineering analysis using advanced CAD/CAM technologies

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Precise brass alloy selection based on component requirements and performance specifications

items.title: Precision Manufacturing
items.description: Advanced CNC machining with multi-axis capabilities for complex component production

items.title: Quality Assurance
items.description: Rigorous multi-stage quality control with advanced measurement technologies

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Specialized surface finishing including polishing, plating, and coating processes

items.title: Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and efficient logistics ensuring component integrity during transportation
